Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: No hemolysis information or data found in the reference(s) presented in this entry
Sequence Information.Cytotoxicity: No cytotoxicity information or data found in the reference(s) presented in this entry
Sequence Information.Mechanism of action: The peptide may inhibit integrase-mediated 3'-processing and integration, which is useful for inhibiting virus replication.

Literature.Title: Identification of a hexapeptide inhibitor of the human immunodeficiency virus integrase protein by using a combinatorial chemical library.
Literature.Reference: Proc Natl Acad Sci U S A. 1995 Dec 5;92(25)11456-60.
Literature.Author: Puras Lutzke RA, Eppens NA, Weber PA, Houghten RA, Plasterk RH.
